jcurses.util
类 Paging

java.lang.Object
  jcurses.util.Paging

public class Paging
extends java.lang.Object

A utility class to handle paging in components. The class get the 'page size' and the size as constructor argument and calculates page numbers, start and end indexes etc...

构造方法摘要
Paging(int pageSize, int size)
          The constructor
 
方法摘要
 int getIndexByPageOffset(int pageNumber, int pageOffset)
          The method returns an index for the given page offset of the given page The extra handling for the last by one page
 int getPageEndIndex(int pageNumber)
          The method returns the end index for the given page
 int getPageNumber(int index)
          The method returns the page number for the given index
 int getPageOffset(int index)
          The method returns the page offset for the given index
 int getPageSize()
          The method returns the number of pages

          The method returns the start index for the given page
